title: Cocktail à la Louisiane Recipe
full_text:
Cocktail à la Louisiane Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
3/4
ounce
rye whiskey
3/4
ounce
sweet vermouth
3/4
ounce
Bénédictine
3 to 4
dashes
Peychaud's bitters
3 to 4
dashes
absinthe
or a substitute (
Herbsaint
,
Pernod
,
Ricard
, or other
pastis
)
Directions
Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass. Fill glass with cracked ice and stir for 20 to 30 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass; garnish with a cherry.
